description: HTML source code for a web-based database viewer interface, including CSS styles and JavaScript logic for fetching and displaying database, table, and data information.
external_files: fetch API calls to endpoints like /api/databases, /api/{db}/tables, /api/{db}/tables/{table}/data

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of databases.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list and resets current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables for a database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates the HTML for displaying table data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for individual table cell, handling different data types.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content to show full data.
